content: Okay, have the call not end up, and have Damian ask how Jon is doing and have him talking a mile a minute about praying for him and his parents concern, and then asking questions about faith just like Damian was, and then going to church and meeting people from smallville. Have Damian barely able to get a word in edgewise and not show much on the outside but have it meaningful and stirring him iup on the inside.
